lead_paragraph: Scientists have found the space lander, which disappeared in 2014 after a rough landing on the surface of a comet.

headline.print_headline: Lost and Found: A Comet Ride That Went Awry
headline.main: No Longer Missing: Rosetta’s Philae Spacecraft Located on Comet

snippet: Scientists have found the space lander, which disappeared in 2014 after a rough landing on the surface of a comet....
abstract: European Space Agency's Philae spacecraft, lost while touching down on  Comet 67P/Churyumov-Gerasimenko in 2014, is discovered protruding from crevasse on comet; location was found with help of photos taken by Rosetta spacecraft.
